title: Plum Blueberry Upside-Down Cake
ingredients: ['150g (5 oz) plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '50g (2 oz) butter', '50g (2 oz) dark brown soft sugar', '75g (3 oz) butter', '200g (7 oz) caster sugar', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '175ml (6 fl oz) milk', '4 plums, stones removed and thinly sliced', '125g (4Â¼ oz) blueberries']
